[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Cryptography] [BLS vs RSA Confusion] The code uses RSA JWKs - could adding BLS JWKs in the future create algorithm confusion vulnerabilities? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Cryptography] [Weak RSA Keys] Does the JWK validation check for minimum RSA key sizes, or could weak keys (e.g., 512-bit) be accepted? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Cryptography] [Nonce Reuse] Are ephemeral signatures protected against nonce reuse attacks in the WebAuthn or ECDSA paths? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Math] [Integer Overflow in Timestamp] At line 208, can onchain_timestamp_obj.microseconds overflow when added to exp_date_secs or exp_horizon_secs? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Math] [Signature Count Integer Cast] At line 203, the cast to usize could behave differently on 32-bit vs 64-bit systems - is this a problem? (Low)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Math] [Expiry Calculation Underflow] When computing expiry windows, could subtraction between timestamps underflow if clock skew is large? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Signature Replay Attack] Can a valid keyless signature be replayed in multiple transactions before its expiry, potentially enabling double-spending or unauthorized actions? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Cross-Chain Replay] Could keyless signatures from one Aptos network (mainnet/testnet) be replayed on another network if JWKs are similar? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Account Recovery Attack] Can the override_aud mechanism at line 302 be abused to take over accounts by crafting recovery scenarios? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [JWK Provider Compromise] If a major OIDC provider's JWKs in PatchedJWKs are compromised, how quickly can they be rotated out without breaking existing accounts? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Training Wheels Removal] When training wheels are removed (training_wheels_pk becomes None), could old signatures still in flight expect training wheels and fail? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Federated Trust Model] In the federated keyless model at line 245, who controls the jwk_addr, and can they unilaterally change JWKs to take over accounts? (Critical)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [OIDC Provider Sunset] If an OIDC provider (issuer) shuts down, are accounts using that issuer permanently locked? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Protocol] [Feature Flag Timing] Can the timing of feature flag enables/disables be exploited to create transactions that some validators accept and others reject? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [Malicious Configuration Update] Can a governance attack or compromised validator set modify the Configuration at line 194 to set max_signatures_per_txn to MAX_U16, enabling resource exhaustion? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [max_exp_horizon_secs Manipulation] Can governance set max_exp_horizon_secs at line 295 to zero, instantly expiring all keyless accounts, or to MAX_U64, allowing indefinite signature validity? (High)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [Training Wheels PK Replacement] Can governance maliciously replace the training_wheels_pubkey at line 223 to use their own key, allowing them to approve any ZK proof? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [JWK Injection Attack] Can governance inject malicious JWKs into PatchedJWKs that match legitimate issuers but use attacker-controlled keys? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [Override Aud Allow-List] Can the override_aud allow-list at line 303 be manipulated to allow unauthorized recovery addresses? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Governance] [PVK Manipulation] Can governance replace the Groth16 PreparedVerifyingKey to accept forged proofs? (Critical)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty Authenticators Vec] What happens if validate_authenticators is called with an empty authenticators vector at line 157 - does it succeed or fail? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Edge Case] [Zero Timestamp] Can onchain_timestamp_obj.microseconds be zero at line 208, and would this cause all signatures to appear expired or never expiring? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Edge Case] [MAX_U64 Expiry] Can exp_date_secs or exp_horizon_secs be set to u64::MAX, causing overflow in expiry calculations? (High)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty JWK kid] What happens if jwt_header.kid at line 122 is an empty string - does it match any JWK or none? (Medium)
[File: aptos-core/aptos-move/aptos-vm/src/keyless_validation.rs] [Edge Case] [Empty Issuer] Can pk.iss_val at line 122 be an empty string, matching a default or wildcard issuer? (Medium)
